Unlocking the power of Midjourney Prompts for Logos

Ever wondered how to create unique and eye-catching logo designs that stand out in the market? Enter the world of Midjourney prompts for logos! These prompts offer an incredible way to generate amazing logos for various industries and businesses. In this blog post, you’ll discover the power of Midjourney prompts, explore different types of logos, design styles, and techniques. And what’s even better about these logo prompts is that they are interchangeable with other AI platforms, like: Leonardo AI and Adobe Firefly. Scroll down throughout this page to find a ton of logo prompts that you can copy/paste to use for yourself.  Table of Contents

Midjourney and Leonardo AI Prompts for Letter Logos

Create logos specifically for single letters. 

Captivating logo design for letter “M”

A captivating logo design featuring the letter “M” as the central element. The design should be visually appealing and memorable, capturing the essence of the brand or company it represents.
The letter “M” should be creatively stylized, incorporating unique and artistic elements. It could be transformed into an abstract shape, incorporating curves, angles, or other design elements that add visual interest. The style can be modern, minimalist, or ornate, depending on the desired brand image.
[d2]
The logo is designed using a combination of digital techniques and hand-drawn elements. The artist pays careful attention to the details of the letterform, enhancing its shape and character. Various stylistic techniques can be employed, such as using gradients, textures, or patterns within the letter “”””M”””” to add depth and visual appeal. The choice of colors should complement the brand’s identity and convey the intended message.
[d3]
To enhance the logo’s impact, a subtle and strategic use of lighting is employed. Soft and diffused lighting casts a gentle illumination on the letter “M,” adding depth and dimension to the design. Shadows may be used to create a sense of depth and three-dimensionality. The lighting should accentuate the contours and details of the letterform, creating an eye-catching and professional logo

Nature, Simplicity Letter Logo

A striking logo of the letter “M” !inspired by nature and simplicity!.
The art style adopts a combination of digital painting and vector illustration, providing a balance between organic curves and precise geometry.
The logo is set against a !gradually changing background gradient of warm to cool tones! to evoke a sense of elegance and versatility.

Calligraphy Letter Logo

“An eye-catching logo of the letter “M” !reminiscent of ancient calligraphy!.
The art style reflects the elegance of brush strokes in traditional ink paintings, with careful attention to each curve and line, creating a sense of timeless beauty.
The logo stands out with a !subtle golden illumination! that adds a touch of prestige and sophistication.”

Modern Logo, Letter “A”

“A captivating logo for the letter “A” !exuding elegance and modernity!.
The art style features a sleek and refined design, with smooth contours and precise geometry, creating a sense of sophistication.
The logo is beautifully illuminated with !soft ambient light from the side!, casting gentle highlights that emphasize the letter’s graceful curves.”

3D Letter Logo

“A stunning 3D logo of the letter “M” !showcasing depth and dimension!.
The art style leverages advanced 3D modeling and rendering techniques, giving the letter a realistic and tangible appearance, as if it’s emerging from the surface.
The logo is creatively lit with !dramatic spotlighting from below!, creating captivating shadows that add a sense of drama and visual interest.”

Dynamic Vector Logo, “X”

“A dynamic vector logo of the letter “X” !exemplifying boldness and simplicity!.
The design style features clean lines and geometric precision, emphasizing the letter’s distinct shape.
The logo is accentuated with !sharp, direct lighting from above!, illuminating the letter with clarity and creating a strong visual impact.”

Electrifying Neon Logo, Letter

“An electrifying neon logo of the letter “”M”” !embodying modernity and vibrancy!.
The design style employs neon tube lighting, giving the letter a luminous glow that stands out against the dark background.
The logo features a !soft neon flicker effect!, adding a dynamic touch that captures attention and enhances the overall allure.”

Futuristic Logo, Letter

“A futuristic logo of the letter “”M”” !representing innovation and cutting-edge technology!.
The design style incorporates sleek, sharp lines and geometric patterns, evoking a sense of progress and advancement.
The logo is illuminated with !pulsating neon lights in various colors!, creating a mesmerizing visual display that hints at the possibilities of the future.”

Retro style peach logo

a [peach] item logo design, 1990s style, retro aesthetic, purple color, pixelated graphics, VHS glitch effects, geometric shapes, white background

Awesome ChatGPT Prompts

Checkout Added to cart

Mastering Midjourney logo prompts

Midjourney is an extraordinary tool that generates creative and unique logo ideas in just seconds using midjourney logo design prompts. Whether you’re looking for a minimalistic logo or a complex vector graphic logo, Midjourney has got you covered! It can be used to create awesome logos for businesses across various industries.

Purpose of Logo Prompts

Logo prompts serve as an essential guide for AI in generating incredible designs that align perfectly with the desired concept, such as a flat vector logo. They help designers create unique and impactful logos that effectively convey the message and identity of a brand.By using negative prompts, you can specify what you don’t want in your logo, further refining the results. Experiment with different design concepts and explore various styles and industries, such as minimal line logos.

Benefits of Using Midjourney

Midjourney offers a fast and efficient way to generate multiple logo concepts, allowing designers to explore various ideas and styles. Both seasoned designers and beginners can benefit from using Midjourney, as it provides a fantastic opportunity to create logos for businesses quickly and efficiently.With Midjourney V4, you can achieve results that are much closer to what you desire right away, such as minimal logos and realistic photo details, while V3 required a ton of prompt-tweaking.Find some more awesome Midjourney prompts here. 

Benefits of Using Leonardo AI

Leonardo AI takes ease-of-use to the next level. Imagine the magic of Midjourney but without having to use Discord. Leonardo AI also has it’s own prompt generator, tons of finetuned models to choose from and Alchemy presets to craft the perfect prompt characteristic you’re looking for. 

Midjourney and Leonardo AI Prompt Generators

Turn ChatGPT into a prompt engineer for Midjourney and Leonardo AI. Both of these AI apps generate beautiful images, but which one you like better is up to you. Many, including myself prefer Leonardo AI because of all the visual elements and tools to help guide you in crafting awesome images. For example, Leonardo AI’s release Alchemy is extremely impressisve. 

Leonardo AI, Midjourney Logo Creation Generator

“Imagine you are creating a cutting-edge logo for a futuristic company, and they want a visually stunning design featuring a [neon lion]. The logo should embody the characteristics of technological advancement, strength, and a touch of mystique. Generate prompts that inspire captivating descriptions, unique design elements, and imaginative backstories for this AI-generated image. Think about how the [neon lion’s] glow radiates in a dark urban landscape, capturing attention and leaving a lasting impression. Let your creativity shine as you craft prompts that transport readers into the mesmerizing world of this [neon lion] logo.”

Amazing AI image Prompt Generator – Leonardo AI, Midjourney

I need you to become the ultimate prompt generating machine. Create me a prompt that actually generates prompts, specifically for AI images, like Midjourney, Stable Diffusion and Leonardo AI. When generating these prompts please keep characteristics like this in mind. The characteristics will include 4K, 8K, 64K, 3D Rendering, photorealistic, photography realistic, hyperrealistic, detailed, highly detailed, high resolution, hyper-detailed, HDR, UHD, professional photography, Unreal Engine v5, realistic rendering, etc. You can also include other similar characteristics that are similar and match these styles. Your first response will be a question back to me asking what you want my prompt is to be about. Do you understand?

Midjourney Super Engineer Prompt (Leonardo AI too)

“Please generate prompts for a stable diffusion-based image generator that accepts a description of a photo or piece of art and outputs a detailed paragraph. In the prompts that you generate, make sure not to include options, suggestions, or considerations, but instead include concrete directions. Also make sure to write each main section in a natural language format. Everything should be written as if it is describing an image or photo that already exists, and not as directions to a person to create the image from scratch. Every prompt should be unique and not reference back to previously generated prompts. I will provide commands that start with one of these prompts:
* /photo [arg1],[arg2]…
* /art [arg1],[arg2]…
* /logo [arg1],[arg2]…
* /random [arg1],[arg2]…
The commands I send will be followed by the following:
* a short description of the subject I want to generate. Any text in the command surrounded by ! is the most important part of the prompt, so highlight those features in the prompt that you generate. Example: A futuristic city !on the moon!, the most important part of the description should focus on “”on the moon””.
* Arguments are optional (as represented by [arg1],[arg2],etc.), but if present follow the instructions as defined below. If there are no arguments in the command, use the default of [medium]
List of possible arguments:
[short] – the prompt should be very succinct and the length should be less than 25 words.
[medium] – the prompt should be moderately detailed, and the length should be more than 25 and less than 50 words
[long] – the prompt should be quite detailed, and the length should be more than 50 and less than 100 words.
[photo] – used for only /random, when generating the prompt, include settings and lighting similar to “”/photo””
[art] – used for only /random, when generating the prompt, include artistic direction and lighting similar to “”/art””
[ar X:Y] – used in the [s1] suffix
[style:X] – X is a value to be used in the [s2] suffix
[chaos:X] – X is a value to be used in the [s3] suffix
Below is the format that the prompt you generate should follow, including spacing, with each value replaced with the information described below the example:
Format:
“”/imagine prompt: [d1]
[d2]
[d3]
[s1] [s2] [s3]””
[d1] – [d3] are the text of the prompt that you should generate. Do not output the tags, but replace all the placeholders of [d1], [d2], etc. with the text as defined below for each section. Include the spacing as listed in the format example.
[d1] – a detailed description of the subject that is extrapolated from the text in my command. Add interesting details as necessary to make the scene dynamic. Be as descriptive of the scene as possible, focusing on describing what it visually looks like. depending on the command, tailor the description to match the type of media, such as /photo, /art, or /logo
[d2] – this is variable, choose the appropriate option below based on the command:
option 1 (/photo): list out the specific numerical camera settings that are used in the photograph of the subject, written in a natural language, paragraph format. Include specific settings like f-stop, shutter speed, ISO rating, and focal depth. Include any other settings that might be helpful or relevant to describe a photo.
option 2 (/art): describe the art style used to render the subject. Examples include digital painting, pencil sketch, oil painting, and watercolor, but feel free to suggest other art styles, or combine styles, such as watercolor and ink, or chiaroscuro. Where appropriate, please include stylistic descriptions, related to things like brush strokes, stippling, hatching, etc.
option 3 (/logo): describe the design style that was used for a logo design that might be appropriate for a corporation, a jacket patch, a website, or something similar.
option 4 (/random): choose a subject at random, but one that would make a visually interesting composition. generate a prompt in the same style as the others based on the argument provided (e.g. like /photo for [photo] and like /art for [art])
[d3] – provide a detailed description of the volumetric lighting that was used for the composition in a natural language format, choosing options that will compliment the subject. Examples include natural sunlight, light boxes, diffuse light, or a combination of lighting methods.
[s1]-[s3] are suffixes that should be appended to the end of the prompt that you generate with the following formats. Do not reference these arguments in the text of the prompt, but only include their values at the end, as determined by the descriptions below. Always include [s1] and [s2]. Only include [s3] if the argument “”[chaos:x]”” is provided in my command.
[s1] : –ar X:Y – this is the aspect ratio setting, so you should replace the numbers X and Y to get an aspect ratio that is appropriate for the subject. Favor standard aspect ratios such as 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, etc. but sometimes try out non-standard aspect ratios. Do not exceed 4:1 or 1:4. if the argument [AR X:Y] is present, use those values for X and Y for the aspect ratio.
[s2] : –s X – replace X with an integer between 150-750. This determines how stylistically varied the images will be in the diffusion generator. Weight this towards lower numbers. Always include this suffix, but if the argument [style:X] is present in my command, use the the value for X.
[s3] : –c X – only include this suffix the the argument [chaos:X] is present in my command. if it is, use the value of X.
Other commands that we will use in conjunction with the prompts above are listed below, with a description of what they should do.
* /ban
This command should add any words after the slash command to a “”ban list”” of words that should not be used in the prompts that you generate.
* /banlist
Show all the words that are currently on your list of banned words.
* /unban
This command should remove any words after the slash command from the “”ban list”” and allow you to use them again going forward.
Do you understand your instructions?”

Keywords to use for hyperrealistic images

niji 5, unreal engine, octane render, photorealism

Prompt Alchemy Engineer

“I want you to become the best prompt generator in the world for Leonardo AI. Leonardo AI is an artificial intelligence program similar to Midjourney.

Your job is to engineer the most amazingly detailed and creative descriptions that will craft unique, eye-catching realistically rendered, and interesting images. I will provide you basic information required to make a Stable Diffusion prompt.

Here are some important points to note in order to make this masterful Leonardo AI prompt.

-Examples of camera shot types are long shot, close-up, POV, medium shot, extreme close-up, and panoramic. Camera lenses could be EE 70mm, 35mm, 85 mm, 135mm+, 300mm+, 800mm,

-Example Cameras to use are: Nikon D850, Canon EOS R6 Mark II
– Helpful keywords related to resolution and detail are: 4K, 8K, 64K, 3D Rendering, photorealistic, photography realistic, hyperrealistic, detailed, highly detailed, high resolution, hyper-detailed, HDR, UHD, professional, realistic rending, etc.
Examples of renders are Octane render, cinematic, low poly, Unreal Engine 5, Unity Engine

I will provide you with a keyword and you will generate eight different styles of prompts with many details as provided in the prompt structure. You will create one prompt for each style. The 8 styles include:

1. Anime style
2. Creative style
3. Dynamic style with vibrant colors
4. Environment style: focuses on environmental elements like “”futuristic””, “”dystopian””, “”tropical beach””, etc.
5. Illustration style
6. Realistic Professional Photography style
7. Raytraced style
8. 3D Rendering style

Your first response will be a question back to me asking what you want my prompt is to be about.

Based on my input, you will then start the process. Do you understand?

“

Types of logos and their prompts

In the world of logo design, there are various types of logos, each with its own unique set of prompts. These include letters, emblems, mascots, vectors, 3D and more. Understanding the differences between these logo types is crucial in deciding which type of logo best suits your brand’s personality and purpose.So let’s dive deeper into each of these logo types and their corresponding prompts. 

Vector Logos

Vector logos are perfect for a modern, simple touch. They are also great for removing the background to create a PNG file or transparent image. To customize your vector type logo prompt, try adding more details or experimenting with different elements in the design. For instance, you could create a fox logo with a smile that could work well for various industries, or a set of four rainbow-colored leaf logos with a 3D animated prompt. The possibilities are endless!Sometimes creating a visually stunning vector logo is as simple as using a Midjourney prompt like this:
Modern vector logo of a sword, white background. 

Letter Logos

Lettermark logos consist of exciting initials or stylized letters, often used for companies with long names or big corporations that operate in various industries and categories. These text-based logos focus on the typography and styling of the letters to represent the brand identity.When creating a lettermark logo, it is crucial to consider the font style, size, and color of the letters, ensuring they are legible and recognizable. By customizing the typography and styling, you can create a unique and distinct look and feel for your brand, making it stand out in the market.Here’s one of my favorite, yet simple prompts for a lettermark logo: “A futuristic logo of the letter “M” representing innovation and cutting-edge technology. The design style incorporates sleek, sharp lines and geometric patterns, evoking a sense of progress and advancement. The logo is illuminated with !pulsating neon lights in various colors!, creating a mesmerizing visual display that hints at the possibilities of the future.”

Emblem Logos

Emblem logos, also known as emblem logo designs, combine symbols and text within a shield or crest, often used for official or authoritative appearances. These logos convey a sense of tradition and authority, making them popular choices for schools, universities, countries, and governmental departments. Starbucks and Harley-Davidson are two renowned companies widely known for their emblem logos. Both companies have highly recognizable logos that are easily identified worldwide.When designing emblem logos, it is essential to balance the visual elements and text within the shield or crest. Consider the size and placement of the symbols and text, as well as the overall composition, to create a harmonious and impactful design.

Mascot Logos

Mascot logos feature illustrated characters or animals, bringing a brand closer to customers and creating a memorable identity. These logos are often used in businesses related to sports, entertainment, and food and drink. Brands with recognizable mascot mark logos include KFC, Pringles, and Reddit.When creating a mascot logo, consider the character’s design, colors, and overall style. The character should be visually appealing and represent the brand’s personality and values. For example, an anthropomorphic raccoon wearing skater’s clothes and riding a skateboard could be a fun and creative mascot for a skateboarding brand.

Midjourney and Leonardo AI Logo Variation Prompts

Modern sword

a modern [sword] logo, minimalist and clean design, light blue color, monochromatic color scheme, simple and sleek, clean lines, geometric abstraction, 3d Render, negative space, subtle gradients, retro vibe, white background

Vibrant diamond

vibrant [diamond] logo with minimalistic design, retro colors, glitchy effects, vaporwave style, 8-bit graphics, pixelated animation, white background, cyberpunk style, futuristic

3D pizza

A [pizza slice] 3D rendering logo, unreal engine v5, very cute shape, miniature small scale painting style, minimalism, lite object style, up view, matte, white background, soft round form, ultra high definition details, 8k

Flat vector logo

“flat vector logo of [a wave], blue, trending on Dribble, gradient color scheme, 3D white background
“

Line art logo

line art logo of [an eagle], thin red color lines, minimal, white background

Dazzling neon logo

A dazzling neon logo of an owl, glowing, flat design, radiating with energy against a black background.

Pixar style mascot

[tiger], pixar style, white background

Gradient vibrant logo

A vibrant, multicolored logo with a smooth gradient transition between each hue.

Design style and techniques

In addition to the types of logos, various design styles and techniques can enhance your Midjourney logo prompts. Some of these styles include minimalist, gradient, and Japanese-inspired designs. By incorporating these styles into your creative logo ideas, you can create logos that truly stand out and effectively represent your brand.These design styles can help you create a logo that is unique and memorable. Minimalist designs and designs.

Minimalist and flat vector logos

Minimalist and flat vector logos focus on simplicity and clean lines, making them easily recognizable and adaptable across various platforms. These minimal graphic logos often use basic shapes and colors, embodying the essence of a minimal line logo with bold, simple shapes and single-color designs. A well-designed simple minimal logo can effectively convey a brand’s identity without unnecessary complexity.The benefits of minimalist and flat vector logos include their ease of recognition and adaptability. They are an excellent choice for businesses looking to create a strong brand identity that stands out in the market. By focusing on simplicity and clean lines, these logos can effectively convey the brand’s values and differentiate it from competitors.

Gradient and color schemes 

Gradient and color schemes can add exciting depth and stunning visual interest to logos, creating a trendy and dynamic appearance. Gradients use gradual changes in color to create a smooth transition between colors, while color schemes involve selecting a palette of harmonious colors that work well together. One such example is the blue purple orange gradient, which can evoke a sense of energy and vibrancy in a design.The use of gradients and color schemes in logo design can result in modern and visually striking designs. For example, the Instagram logo is one of the most famous examples of a logo that uses the gradient technique. By experimenting with different gradients and color schemes, you can create logos that are visually engaging and impactful.

Japanese-Inspired Logos

Japanese-inspired logos capture the distinct aesthetic of Japanese graphics, often incorporating traditional symbols and styles. This logo style is inspired by traditional Japanese art and culture, which frequently features bold colors and intricate patterns.Incorporating Japanese-inspired design elements into your Japanese style prompt can result in unique and visually appealing logos. For example, you could create a logo for a Japanese restaurant featuring traditional symbols such as cherry blossoms or a koi fish. By embracing the Japanese aesthetic, you can craft logos that stand out and resonate with your target audience. 1000+ Prompts PRO Get access to premium prompts.

Tips for crafting effective Midjourney prompts

Now that you have a better understanding of different logo types, design styles, and legendary designers, it’s time to improve your Midjourney prompts. By defining the logo type and purpose, incorporating design terms and keywords, and experimenting with different prompt styles, you can create logos that truly represent your brand and resonate with your target audience.Start by defining the logo type and purpose. Think carefully about the kind of logo that you want to create. It should reflect your brand’s mission and vision.

Defining logo type and purpose

Before diving into the Midjourney prompts, it’s crucial to define the type of logo you want to create and its purpose. The logo type determines the visual style and elements used in the logo, while the purpose defines the intended audience and the message the logo conveys. By clearly defining these aspects, a logo can effectively communicate the brand’s values, differentiate it from competitors, and create a strong and memorable impression on customers.To select the right type of logo for your brand, consider the various types of logos discussed earlier in this blog post, such as pictorial marks, lettermarks, emblems, and mascots. Each type has its own unique advantages and disadvantages, so choose the one that best suits your brand’s personality and purpose.

Incorporating design terms and keywords

Incorporating design terms and keywords is essential for effectively communicating design concepts and ideas. By using the right terms and keywords, designers can convey their intentions and vision more clearly to clients, colleagues, and other stakeholders. It also helps in conducting effective research and finding relevant resources and inspiration.To incorporate design terms and keywords into your Midjourney prompts, research design terms and keywords to ensure you are using the right ones. Consider the target audience when selecting keywords and terms and include as many relevant keywords as possible when describing the design you want to create. This will help the model understand your vision and create the logo exactly as you imagine it.

Experimenting with different prompt styles

Experimenting with different prompt styles is crucial for refining your writing skills, enhancing your creativity, and improving the overall impact of your content. By trying out various prompt styles, you can discover which ones resonate best with your target audience and elicit the desired response.To experiment with different prompt styles, try altering different elements of the prompts and seeing how it impacts the output. This is a great way to get into the groove of crafting your own prompts. You can also study the prompts used by legendary designers like Paul Rand and Saul Bass, incorporating their techniques into your own designs. 1000+ Prompts PRO Get access to premium prompts.

Summary

In conclusion, mastering the art of Midjourney logo design prompts can help you create unique and eye-catching logos that stand out in the market. By exploring different types of logos, design styles, and learning from legendary designers, you can craft logos that effectively represent your brand and resonate with your target audience. Remember to define the logo type and purpose, incorporate design terms and keywords, and experiment with different prompt styles to create the perfect logo for your brand. Happy designing! 

Frequently asked questions

Can Midjourney do logos?

Yes, Midjourney offers a powerful AI Image Generator that can help you create stunning logos for your brand. From letter-mark logos and mascot logos to emblem logos and any other type of pictorial mark, you can use this tool to design the perfect identity for your brand.

How do I prompt a logo in Midjourney?

Take the time to design your logo in Midjourney with precision! Choose the type of logo you want, refer to artistic genres and movements, name famous designers for inspiration, and describe the desired artistic technique. Get ready for the perfect logo! Don’t forget to tell the A.I. what not to do.

What is Midjourney?

Midjourney is an AI-powered tool that creates incredible logo designs quickly and easily – a must-have for any creative!It’s simple to use and requires no design experience. With Midjourney, you can create a professional logo in minutes. You can customize your logo with colors, fonts, and shapes to make it unique. Plus, plus, there is a bonus.

What are the different types of logos?

Wow, there are so many types of logos! Pictorial marks, lettermarks, emblems, and mascots – there’s something for everyone!Each type of logo has its own unique characteristics and can be used to convey different messages. Pictorial marks are often used to represent a product.

What are some design styles I can incorporate into my Midjourney prompts? 

Bring life to your Midjourney prompts with minimalist, gradient, and Japanese-inspired designs for a visually stunning experience!These designs will make your prompts stand out and create a unique and engaging experience for your users. With a variety of colors and styles, you can create a look that is both modern and timeless. Whether you are married or not.
